author: Kabir Ahmad
comment: Hanafi Asr choice doesn't work. I've sent numerous emails via the app and directly through the website detailing the fault with photos showing the mistake and have never got a reply back from the developer. I asked if they knew that Asr prayer has 2 options in the app but instead of showing the Asr time slightly differently ,according to whether you select the HANAFI option or the MALIKI/HANBALI/SHAFI option, it shows the same time. If you have this option in a prayer app then you must understand what it means and then make sure that it works otherwise it puts into question your credibility. I don't know why the developer will not reply to me or engage with me. All I want is the app to work.

author: Tiffany
comment: My favorite prayer time app for Android. The widget is a huge time saver to see the next prayer and countdown and as well as the qibla tracker is very accurate. So happy that the widget also updates time in its own now without having to open the app itself!

reply.author: Quanticapps Ltd
reply.content: Salam waalaykoum Tiffany, the bug has been fixed with our new version published today. Please make sure to rate us again if you're happy with the result. Barakallah Fik

author: Ahmed Tobgy
comment: It is a good app, but disappointed because could not restore my previous purchase to remove ads and have widgets

reply.author: Quanticapps Ltd
reply.content: Salam Ahmed, thank you for your feedback, can you please contact our support and we will assist you with restoring your purchase. Please if you're satisfied with our service please update your review for us. Barakallah Fik

author: Roqibat Idris
comment: Great

author: Alejandra Qualigro
comment: The app should be like iOS : prayers notification! period. Now on the unsecured platform (Android) you tried to implement the Calls control without asking the user permission , and even that asks for contacts permission and the user denied the app still knowing all the contacts and controlling their calls : what does that mean? I'm extremely upset , that's so ridiculous! I'm feeling like somebody spying on my calls on the name of Islam :@

reply.author: Quanticapps Ltd
reply.content: Salam waalykoum Joseph, we dont spy on your calls or any of your data. We have the feature optional the app doesn't require the feature to work so you can turn it off from the intro. It's a simple way for us to pay for charges and development fees. We're more than happy to answer any of your interrogation by emailing our support. Barakallah Fik
